name: Endless Runner Prototype (Waterleaf)
description:
CONTROLS:

W & S / Up & Down Arrow Keys

DESCRIPTION:

This is the early form of a 2D endless runner game I'm working on, hopefully I'll be able to update it at least somewhat frequently.  Also the current web build has a bugged score system which the downloadable version doesn't, that is because I had to redo the web version after the downloadable one and after I had gotten started on the score system because it had file compression turned on, which for some reason makes things bug out.
